mainboard.name: Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

mainboard.name: Young Pyromancer
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

mainboard.name: Goblin Bombardment
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Mayhem Devil
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Mayhem Devil deals 1 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Chandra, Hope's Beacon
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability triggers only once each turn.
+2: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
+1: Exile the top five cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among those exiled cards.
−X: Chandra, Hope's Beacon deals X damage to each of up to two targets.

mainboard.name: Bloodghast
mainboard.oracle_text:
Bloodghast can't block.
Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Puncture Blast
mainboard.oracle_text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Puncture Blast deals 3 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Goblin Arsonist
mainboard.oracle_text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Severed Strands
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.

mainboard.name: Hellion Eruption
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.

mainboard.name: Bloodsoaked Champion
mainboard.oracle_text:
Bloodsoaked Champion can't block.
Raid — {1}{B}: Return Bloodsoaked Champion from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if you attacked this turn.

mainboard.name: Murderous Redcap
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

mainboard.name: Phoenix Chick
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Phoenix Chick can't block.
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you may pay {R}{R}. If you do, return Phoenix Chick from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking with a +1/+1 counter on it.

mainboard.name: Bloodstained Mire
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Mogg War Marshal
mainboard.oracle_text:
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

mainboard.name: Evolving Wilds
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Abrade
mainboard.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.

mainboard.name: Faerie Dreamthief
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Faerie Dreamthief enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
{2}{B}, Exile Faerie Dreamthief from your graveyard: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

mainboard.name: Guttersnipe
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

mainboard.name: Stitcher's Supplier
mainboard.oracle_text: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.

mainboard.name: Bone Shards
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

mainboard.name: Flame Slash
mainboard.oracle_text: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

mainboard.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Embereth Veteran
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Embereth Veteran: Create a Young Hero Role token attached to another target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it.")

mainboard.name: Ogre-Head Helm
mainboard.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Whenever Ogre-Head Helm or equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, discard your hand, then draw three cards.
Reconfigure {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

mainboard.name: Faithless Looting
mainboard.oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

sideboard.name: Tezzeret, Betrayer of Flesh
sideboard.oracle_text:
The first activated ability of an artifact you activate each turn costs {2} less to activate.
+1: Draw two cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
−2: Target artifact becomes an artifact creature. If it isn't a Vehicle, it has base power and toughness 4/4.
−6: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact you control becomes tapped, draw a card."

sideboard.name: Trading Post
sideboard.oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

sideboard.name: Sai of the Shinobi
Ephemerate
sideboard.oracle_text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

sideboard.name: Vampire of the Dire Moon
sideboard.oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

sideboard.name: Reckless Rage
sideboard.oracle_text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

sideboard.name: Unholy Heat
sideboard.oracle_text:
Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

sideboard.name: Duress
sideboard.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

sideboard.name: Scavenger Drake
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.

sideboard.name: Beacon of Unrest
sideboard.oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

sideboard.name: Oathsworn Vampire
sideboard.oracle_text:
Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped.
You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

sideboard.name: Tibalt's Rager
sideboard.oracle_text:
When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
{1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

sideboard.name: Carrion Feeder
sideboard.oracle_text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

sideboard.name: Quillspike
sideboard.oracle_text: {B/G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from a creature you control: Quillspike gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

sideboard.name: Vampire Aristocrat
sideboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

sideboard.name: Viscera Seer
sideboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

sideboard.name: Whisper, Blood Liturgist
sideboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
